bioconda.name: mashmap
bioconda.summary: A fast approximate aligner for long DNA sequences.

biocontainers.name: mashmap
biocontainers.summary: a fast and approximate long read mapper

biotools.summary: MashMap implements a fast and approximate algorithm for computing local alignment boundaries between long DNA sequences. It can be useful for mapping genome assembly or long reads (PacBio/ONT) to reference genome(s). Given a minimum alignment length and an identity threshold for the desired local alignments, Mashmap computes alignment boundaries and identity estimates using k-mers

bioschemas.name: MashMap
